duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver the highest level of customer service for internal partners by administering and customizing the ServiceNow platform.
Update, maintain, and dispatch tickets in the ticketing systems.
Configure and customize ServiceNow platform to meet specific needs, including designing and implementing workflows and forms.
Create and manage reports, dashboards, and metrics within ServiceNow.
Manage user accounts, roles, and permissions within ServiceNow.
Work with other teams to make recommendations on the efficient use of ServiceNow features to enhance customer experience.
Integrate application modules between other applications and/or vendors.
Continuous review of business and IT processes, technologies, and deployments, and make recommendations for improvements.
Document and train users on IT systems and standard methodologies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field (Master's preferred)
